title: New: North Bay – Echo
body:
It’s clear from the off that Oxford’s **Tom Jenkinson** aka **North Bay** is no slacker.

Having released his debut track, the scintillating [_Breath_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/14506-new-north-bay-breath/) only a couple of days back, he’s dropped another ambient masterpiece in the form of _Echo_. Clocking in at over five minutes, _Echo_ is a stunning journey, through hymnal-esque vocals and perfectly timed handclaps. What makes this track even more wonderful is it’s reassuring self-belief, despite it’s fragile elements. Check out _Echo_ below.
